ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 124
ygData.msgSnippet: The reason we don t know where the book came from is because the book came from no where.  It was hacked out of the code on the disk.  The person does not want
ygData.messageBody:
The reason we don't know where the book came from is because the book came from
no where. It was hacked out of the code on the disk. The person does not want
to banned that is why we don't know where it came from and the information is
anonymous. But as most hackers, he/she apparently believes in freedom of
knowledge and shared it with us.

DathaScome@... wrote:

> From: DathaScome@...
>
> I totaly agree.The only reason o can see for them not telling where the booik
> can be found is if there is something else whereever it is they found the
> book that they dont want people to know about.
>
> Xalumkin of Bertoxx

--Eron
